original_text: Then all the people of Judah took Uzziah, who was sixteen years old, and made him king in the room of his father Amaziah.
korean_text: 유다 온 백성이 나이가 십육 세 된 웃시야를 세워 그의 아버지 아마샤를 대신하여 왕으로 삼으니

sentences.original_text: Then all the people of Judah took Uzziah
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 유다의 모든 백성이 웃시야를 세워

sentences.original_text: in the room of his father Amaziah
